topics.body:
So I'm looking at the path the tornado that ripped through the state took to see why it took so long to get power.  It literally took the most "fuck you electricity" path possible.

I legitimately feel sorry for the technicians cause they're probably going to be working for the next week doing the same shit over and over and over again for 12 hours a day to repair the damage power lines.

Either A)god hates electricity or B)god really hates that power line technician that has to fix all those power lines.

topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: So I just had a thought. A lot of people were talking shit about the 2014 Redesign of Godzilla. Saying he was "Too fat" or "to blubbery" or his legs were too short and chunky. In short, he's very bottom heavy. Wouldn't an animal that big NEED short strong stocky legs to support it's own body weight? I mean he's *300 feet tall.* And another thing people don't consider is the face. In the new Godzilla movie Big G did something he's never truly been able to do, EMOTE. Old Godzilla relied primarily on body language.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
